name: Dr.K.Madhavi
about: Dr. Karanam Madhavi, Professor of Computer Science and Engineering Department, completed her Ph.D from JNTUA in 2013. She has over twenty years of academic experience in various institutions in India. Her Ph.D work was on Model-Driven Software Evolution which was carried at JNTUA, Anantapur, A.P, India. Prior to PhD, she had earned Bachelors of Engineering in Computer Science and Engineering from Kuvempu University, Karnataka in 1997, and M.Tech in Software Engineering from JNTUA, Anantapur, Andhra Pradesh in 2003. Dr,Madhavi has interest include software engineering, mobile software engineering and cloud computing. Dr. Madhavi currently as a Head of the Department, She has been taken this adminstartion role since December, 2018. She was a Dean ICT and ICT Coordinator, managed Learning Management System of GRIET-Moodle for Teaching –Learning purpose to all undergraduate and Post graduate degree programmes at GRIET. She has been in this role since 2016. These Moodle courses conducted every year from which 5000+ students are benefitted. In past Dr.Madhavi had major role as M.Tech coordinator and NBA Coordinator for M.Tech Software Engineering. Dr.Madhavi is active in motivating students to take part in CSI memberships as a CSI Student Brach Counsellor. She has been in this role since 2016. GRIET CSI SB is active with 532 student members of CSE department and actively conducting various technical and non technical events under supervision of Dr.Madhavi. She has published many papers in international journals and conferences. She is also Life Member of CSI and ISTE

name: Dr.K.Anuradha
about: Dr.K.Anuradha, is working as Professor in Computer Science and Engineering in GRIET since 2007. She is also the Dean of Academic Affairs since 2014 in GRIET. She has over 31 years of academic and research experience in Gokaraju Rangaraju Institute of Engineering and Technology and VNRVJIET in Hyderabad. She completed her Ph.D from JNTU, Anantapur in 2011 & Ph.D in Mathematics from JNTU, Hyderabad in 2006. Prior to PhD, she studied Master of Technology in Computer Science from Birla Institute of Technology, Ranchi.Dr.Anuradha currently as a DEAN ICT, manages Learning Management System of GRIET-Moodle for Teaching–Learning purpose to all undergraduate and Post graduate degree programmes at GRIET. She has been in this role since February , 2019.Dr. Anuradha’s research interests are Data Mining, Big Data Analytics, Machine Learning and Software Engineering in which she has more than 35 publications in various reputed journals and conferences.. She is top performer in “Data Mining” NPTEL course by IIT Madras. She is also Life Member of ISTE.

name: Dr.B.Srinivasa Rao
about: Dr.B.Srinivasa Rao, Professor of Computer Science and Engineering, completed his Ph.D from University of Bhopal, Bhopal, India and has over Thirty years of academic, research and administration experience. His Ph.D work was on Computer Simulations of Complex Defects. He had earned Masters of Technology in Computer Science from Birla Institute of Technology, Ranchi, India. He completed Master of Philosophy with Microprocessors and Space Physics as specializations from RD University, Jabalpur, India. He obtained Master of Science degree with Electronics and Radio Physics specialization from RD University, Jabalpur, India. He also got Post Graduate Diploma in Computer Science from University of Hyderabad, India. He visited the National University Singapore, Singapore in 2004. Dr.Srinivasa Rao is currently managing the Faculty of Computer Programming and Data Structures at Department Computer Science and Engineering,GRIET,since 2013. In addition,he has also handled responsibilities of Dean of Finishing School and BOS Chairman for I year B.Tech. Dr.Srinivasa Rao,current research interests include design and implementation of cryptanalytic attacks for various security systems,developing cryptographic security models for Internet and WSN,Designing energy efficient algorithms for WSN and Modelling and simulation of various systems,in which he has more than 65 publications,in various journals and conferences.He is currently working on design of combined cryptanalysis techniques for block ciphers and hash algorithms and message digest algorithms.He is supervising Five Ph.D.students.He was awardees of CSIR,New Delhi direct Senior Research Fellowship in 1990 and awardees of MAPCOST Junior Research Fellowship in 1988.

name: Dr. G.S.Bapi raju
about: Dr. Srinivasa Bapiraju Gadiraju, Professor of Computer Science and Engineering, completed his Ph.D from Andhra University and has over twenty-five years of academic, industrial and research experience. His Ph.D work was on Analysis on trace elements in human tissues using PIXE. The work is done in collaboration with NCCCM (National Centre for Characterisation of Composite Materials) at BARC ext. Center, Hyderabad. He had earned Masters of Engineering in Computer Science and Engineering from GITAM University, M.Sc and Ph.D in Nuclear Physics from Andhra University. Guided various projects for both B.Tech and M.Tech students, conducted seminars and workshops. Visited various colleges for final year projects adjudication.

name: Dr. P. Chandra Sekhar Reddy
about: Dr. P. Chandra Sekhar Reddy, completed his Ph.D. from JNTUA University in Computer Science and Engineering. He has 19 years of teaching, research and administrative experience. He has earlier worked as Associate professor and HOD in CSE Dept. in various reputed Engineering Colleges. His Research interest includes Image Processing, Data Mining and IoT. He has published more than 20 research papers in International journals and International conferences. He is a reviewer for international journals and chair persons at International Conferences. He has guided more than 30 projects both at UG and PG level and presented more than 10 guest lecturers. He organized many Technical events and faculty development programs.

name: Dr. Cherukupalli. Mallikarjuna Rao
about: Dr. Cherukupalli. Mallikarjuna Rao, Professor of Computer Science and Engineering and Controller of Examinations. completed Ph.D in Computer Science and Engineering from JNTUA University, Ananthapuramu and M.Tech in Computer Science Engineering from JNTUA Ananthapuramu, Andhrapradesh. I am having over 20 years of academic and research experience.

name: Dr. B Shankar Babu
about: Dr.B.Sankara Babu,Professor of Computer Science and Engineering and Dean for Internships, completed his Ph.D from Acharya Nagarjuna University, Guntur and has over fifteen years of academic and research experience in Gokaraju Rangaraju Institute of Engineering and Technology and Anwar-UL- Uloom College of Engineering and Technology in Hyderabad. His Ph.D work was on Pattern Extraction and String Transformation in Data Mining. Prior to PhD, he was studied Bachelor of Technology in Computer Science and Engineering from MVGR College of Engineering, Vizianagaram, Andhra Pradesh and Master of Technology in Computer Science and Engineering from Jawaharlal Nehru Technological University, Hyderabad, Telangana. Professor Sankara Babu’s research interests are Data Mining, Data Science and Internet of Things in which he has Published more than 28 publications in various reputed International journals and conferences. He is a member of IAENG, SDIWC and life member of CSI. He is recipient of Top Performing Mentor in Data Mining, NPTEL by IIT Madras.

name: Dr.G. R.Shakti dharan
about: Dr.G.R.Sakthidharan is currently working as Professor in the department of computer science and engineering. He completed Diploma in Computer Technology completed in the year 1998 securing First Class with Honors. In 2004, he had completed his B.E in Computer Science and Engineering in Periyar University, Salem, Tamil Nadu in the year 2004 securing First class. He completed his M.Tech in Computer Science and Engineering on the year 2006 in S.R.M University, Chennai, Tamil Nadu securing First Class with distinction. He was awarded Ph.D on November, 2014 under Anna University, Chennai, Tamil Nadu His specialization includes Wireless Sensor Networks, Mobile Computing, Computer Networks, IOT, Embedded system and System on Chip. Dr.G.R.Sakthidharan was supervising Ph.D scholar under Visvesvaraya Technological University, Belagavi, Karnataka. As of now, he have attended 22 faculty development programs and workshops. He has 15 research publications in reputed journals and International conferences. He has given guest lectures and seminars which is Sponsored by DRDO and AICTE. He is holding life member in C.S.I and I.S.T.E professional societies. He has total 14 years of experience which includes 2 years in Industry also.

name: Dr S Govinda Rao
about: Dr. S Govinda Rao, Professor of Computer Science and Engineering, He Joined in this institute since November 2006, completed his Ph.D from Jawaharlal Nehru Technological University Kakinada (JNTUK) year of 2017 under the Supervision of Dr AGovardhan, Rector at JNTUH. His Ph.D work on “A Novel Approach in K Means Clustering Algorithm to Evaluate and Assess H and G Indices of Scientific Authors”. He is around 14 years of Teaching and Research Experience. He completed M.Tech. From A.U College Of engineering at Andhra University, Visakhapatnam year of 2006.He Completed M.Sc.(Information Systems) from Andhra University year of 2003 and also he completed Bachelor Degree BCA from Andhra University year of 2001. Dr. S Govinda Rao Research interesting areas are Data Mining, Computer Networking and Security and its application areas. He had published around 30 papers in various International Journals and Conferences and also he has Filed 2 Patents from Intellectual Property of India. He Guided 12 M.Tech Projects and 24 B.Tech Projects. Dr S Govinda Rao has Life Member of Institute of Engineers (MIE), earlier he is Coordinator for GRIET-CSI Student Branch, during that period and he was conducted various Technical Fests and Activities under CSI Student Branch. He had Organizing Committee Member for Springer International Conference (ICWSNUCA) 2018 at GRIET. He attended around 20 FDP’s/STTP’s. Also he was conducted Various Faculty Development Programs in Department of CSE. Dr S Govinda Rao actively participated in Academic and Administrative works in Department and Institutional Level. He got Topper (top 5%) certificate in “Computer Architecture and Organization “from NPTEL IITB. He got OCJP certification from Oracle Corporation.

name: Dr.G.N. Bina Bethel
about: To work in a challenging and responsible position where I can enhance my knowledge and skills tocontribute to your dynamic and esteemed organization, under the noble guidance of my senior advisors. To pursue a career in any reputed organization that offers an adequate exposure in the areas that will exploit my subject skills as well as administration skills.

name: Dr.G.Charles Babu
about: Dr.G.Charles Babu, Professor of Computer Science and Engineering Department, completed his Ph.D from Acharya Nagarjuna University ( ANU ) in 2015.He has over 21 Years of Professional Experience in Various Institutions in Telangana & Andhra Pradesh. He completed M.Tech ( Software Engineering) from JNTUH Campus Hyderabad in 1999 and Completed B.Tech ( CSE ) from Koneru Lakshmaiah College of Engineering ( KLCE ) in 1997. Dr.G.Charles Babu Research interesting areas are Data Mining, Big data, Cloud Computing , Machine Learning. He Published around 60 Papers in Various International Journals and Conferences.He Published 4 Patents. He guided 32 M.Tech Projects and 50 B.Tech Projects.

name: Dr. Kayiram Kavita
about: More than 13 years teaching experience in BITS-Pilani, Hyderabad Campus and other institutions with exceeding academic standards and enhancing overall curriculum and a reputed lecturer at the top university.

name: Dr.  P Varaprasad Rao

He completed M.Tech from A.U College Of engineering at Andhra University, Visakhapatnam year of 2006.He Completed B.E.(CSE) from BDU University year of 2002. He got Elite certificate in “Cryptography and Network security “from NPTEL IITB. He got OCJP certification from Oracle Corporation.

name: R.Aruna Flarence
about: R.Aruna Flarence Associate Professor in Computer Science and Engineering, completed her M.Tech from Acharya Nagarjuna University, Guntur and has over fourteen years of academic and research experience in Gokaraju Rangaraju Institute of Engineering and Technology , Jyothi Engineering college in Hyderabad and Madina Engineering College in Kadapa. Her research interests are Data Mining, Big Data Analytics, Machine Learning and Text mining in which she has more than 8 publications in various reputed journals and conferences. She has been certified in Sun Certified Java Programmer (SCJP ) and Oracle Certified Web Component Developer(OCWCD).Actively participated in moodle activities in GRIET.

name: Dr. Ramesh
about: Dr. G. Ramesh is currently working as an Associate Professor in Department of Computer Science & Engineering, GRIET, Hyderabad. He received his B.Tech degree in information technology from RGMCET, Nandyal, Kurnool Dist. Andhra Pradesh, and He received his M. Tech degree in software engineering from JNTUA College of Engineering, Ananthapuramu, Andhra Pradesh, India, He received his PhD from JNTUA, Anatapuramu, Andhra Pradesh, India. He has ten years of academic and research experience. His main research interest includes software engineering and big data. He is in teaching since 2008. He has published a several papers in various international journals/ conferences. He is life member in IAENG.

name: Dr.S.Bhargavi Latha
about: Bhargavi Latha S, Associate Professor of Computer Science and Engineering at GRIET is completed her Ph.D. in Image Processing registered with JNTU, Hyderabad. Prior to Ph.D., she had earned Bachelors of Technology in Electronics and Communication and Masters of Technology in Computer Science and Engineering.Ever since she joined GRIET in 2011,she became an asset by contributing her might as the most coveted teacher,active volunteer in workshops,curricular and co - circular activities.She is instrumental in steering through various inspections like NAAC,NBA,etc.Her communication skills motivate her students in right direction who shared their gratitude in their later career.

name: Dr.Ashlin Deepa R. N
about: Associate Professor of Computer Science and Engineering, completed her M.Tech from AKCE Madurai, has over 12 years of academic and research experience . She earned Bachelors of Engineering in Computer Science and Engineering from VIT, Vellore .

name: Dr. Sushmita Valli. G
about: Dr. Susmitha Valli. G, Associate Professor in Computer Science and Engineering, .She joined GRIET in the year 2021.She completed her Ph.D., from JNTU KAKINADA in the year 2017 under the supervision of Dr. Ch. Divakar and Dr. Ch. Satyanarayana. M. Tech from Andhra University in 2008.She is much interested in the area of bioinformatics and bioimage processing of diseases like cancer and diabetes. There are about 30 publications to her bag and has published 2 patents. She is a life member of CSI, ISTE, IAENG and annual member of IEEE.

name: Dr.Krishna Bhargavi Y
about: Dr. Krishna Bhargavi Yerraganti, Associate Professor of Computer Science and Engineering at GRIET has joined as faculty by willful choice with passion to share the wisdom gained from “Whom she follows to those who follow her among students”, with a wish to inspire young generation of engineers. Having faith in the truth that a teacher should be ready to learn all through the life, she attends all workshops, FDPs, seminars availing every opportunity to update herself and to expand horizons of wisdom to equip herself to meet the challenges of ever changing scenario of technology. She completed her Ph.D in Big Data Analytics and Cloud Computing from JNTUK, Kakinada in 2022. Prior to Ph.D, she had earned Bachelors of Technology in Information Technology and Masters of Technology in Software Engineering. Her scholastic excellence reflected profusely in her academic profile. Endowed with enormous potential to absorb the essence of any situation in the first attempt itself and indefatigable zeal to perform, she is ready volunteer at all administrative, organizing activities of the institution. Lucid perception and strategic planning makes her successful in many opportune times to steer clear to the deserving destiny. Her convincing communication skills are appropriate application to counsel and motivate her students in right direction who reciprocated their gratitude in their later career. Orthodox and tradition bound person who makes herself available to any positive and constructive activity. Commitment to complete assigned works makes her the first choice in any situation. Devotion to the profession always fetches her exquisite star rating in feedbacks. All these qualities secured her a safe niche in GRIET family, thanks to the Management for its soft corner towards meritorious people.

name: Dr.V Sri lakshmi
about: Dr. V. Srilakshmi, is Associate Professor of Computer Science and Engineering in GRIET. She joined the Department of CSE, GRIET in 2012. She completed Ph.D in Computer Science and Engineering from JNTU college of Engineering, Anantapur and M.Tech(CSE) from TRR College of Engineering, Hyderabad in the year 2011. Her area of research interest includes: Text Mining, Machine Learning, Data Science and Natural Language Processing. She has 17 years of teaching experience. She has published papers in international conferences and journals. She has been certified as Oracle Certified Java Standard Edition 6 Programmer (OCJP) and Oracle Certified Associate(OCA). She stood one among the Top 1% securing 92% in Cloud Computing course in NPTEL courses. She got qualified in Faculty Eligibility Test (FET) conducted by JNTUH in the year 2013 and State Eligibility Test (SET) conducted by Osmania University in the year 2015.

Her research interests are Data Mining, Big Data Analytics, Machine Learning and Text mining in which she has 2 publications in reputed journals. She has been certified in Oracle Certified(OCA).

name: B.Padma Vijetha Dev
about: B.Padma Vijetha Dev, Assistant Professor in Computer Science & Engineering, completed M.Tech in Computer Science Engineering from Acharya Nagarjuna University, Guntur and B.Tech in Computer Science Technology from Sathyabama Deemed University, Chennai having overall 9 years of academic and research experience and Presently working as Assistant Professor from a prestigious institution Gokaraju Rangaraju Institute of Engineering and Technology, Hyderabad.Her areas of Research are Information Retrieval Systems.She is well skilled in communication and comprehension.She has delivered scheduled lecturers to sophomore and freshman students.She conveyed subject matter and lecture to the students in a creative way.She has conducted Moodle Courses effectively for handled subjects.She evaluated the students individually to identify areas of difficulties.She researched study materials per syllabus requirements.She performed experimental activities and drew out conclusions.She has thorough understanding of the subject.She is knowledgeable in internal administrative tasks.She guided mini and major projects under graduate level and one of her projects got shorlisted for 1 st AICTE Chhatra Vishwakarma Awards 2017.She has successfully completed an AICTE approved Faculty Development Programme(FDP201x) on Pedagogy for online and Blended Teaching - Learning Process conducted by IIT Bombay from September 14,2017 to October 12,2017 and stood top amongst 241 performers from a total of 5308 participants in the programme

She has an experience of 10 years of academic experience and guided many projects in the field of security and networks. Her research interests include cloud computing and network security.Her research interests include cloud computing and network security.

name: N Krishna Chythanya
about: I am an avid reader of books and readily shares my knowledge with students and colleagues who approach for help in subject or life. Has conducted more than 10000 training hours for Competitive exams like Banks Clerks/POs , LIC, RRB,Police etc,and Personality Development, besides this has a rich 15+ years of Teaching experience to Graduate and Post Graduate Engineering Students in different reputed Engineering Colleges. Successfully handled varied engineering subjects in the past and also served at different positions like Head,Department of I.T.,Head,Dept.Of CSE, Deputy Director Training & Placements, Director Training & Placements in various Engineering Colleges where in efficiently and in a optimized way conducted related activities.I did my B.E.(Comp.Tech.) and M.Tech(CSE) and is currently pursuing PhD in the area of Neural Networks and Software Engineering. My area of interests includes Neural Networks,Software Engineering,Operating Systems,Information Security. I am open for collaborative work with like minded people for projects or research papers.

name: Boda Sindhuja
about: Boda Sindhuja is an assistant professor in Computer Science and Engineering at GRIET. She pursued her masters in Computer Science and Engineering from JNTU Hyderabad and had about three years of academic and teaching experience in the field of social networking and programming.She has been actively involved in guiding numerous mini and major projects to undergraduate students. Sindhujas research interest includes networks,Software Engineering,cloud computing and Data science.To her credit,she has published a couple of research articles on temporally valid multidimensional social networks and also presented her work in a national conference on the E - Learning on Larval Frame work in Computer Science and Engineering.At GRIET,Sindhuja has proved herself as a renowned assistant professor with her extensive teaching and administrative abilities.Also,she is well known to enlight young undergraduate minds with motivation and exposure to advances in the field of Social networking,cloud computing,Software Engineering and Data Science.

name: B.S.Anil Kumar

Anil Kumar is presently into Training & Placements team and is designated as CSE Department Coordinator, Training & Placements. As a part of his job he liaisons with the institute’s students. He corresponds and communicates with the students about the various activities related to Training & Placements Cell. Liasioning with the employer guests, coordinating in arranging the logistics required for conducting placements activities, monitoring their hospitality needs is a part of his job routine. Coordinating with Dean Training, in designing training activities, communicating and liasioning with the training consultants, devising training schedules, taking care of the requirements for conducting training activities is another phase of his responsibility as the coordinator.

name: Mrs. Channa basamma
about: Mrs. Channabasamma is currently working as an Assistant professor in the Dept. of CSE at Gokaraju Rangaraju Institute of Engineering and Technology Hyderabad. She has qualified for GATE and Karnataka-SET. She is pursuing her PhD at Visvesvaraya Technological University (VTU) Belagavi. She obtained her M.Tech (CSE) from Acharya Institute of Technology Bangalore & BE(CSE) from Poojya Doddappa Appa College of Engineering(PDACE) Gulbarga in the year 2014 & 2012 respectively. She has teaching experience of 7 years. She has 6 publications in International Conferences and reputed Journals. She is also the member of ISTE, IAENG and IACSIT. Her research interests include Machine Learning, Big Data Analytics, NLP, Artificial Intelligence and Recommender Systems.

name: Y.Lakshmi Prasanna
about: Y.Lakshmi Prasanna, Assistant Professor, Department of Computer Science and Engineering, joined GRIET in the year 2021. She completed her M.Tech- CS from JNTUH in the year 2010 and B.Tech- CSIT from JNTU in the year 2005. She is pursuing her Ph.D. under the supervision of Dr. E.Madhusudhana Reddy from JNTUH, Hyderabad. Her current research interests are security in wireless sensor networks, Machine learning and AI. Her research work includes Design and implementation of energy efficient privacy preserving models for WSN Internet and WSN. She has published more than 20 papers in various journals, conferences and published a patent. She is a life member of ISTE.

name: Mr.A Nagender Babu
about: Mr. A Nagender Babu is currently working as an Assistant professor in the Dept. of CSE at Gokaraju Rangaraju Institute of Engineering and Technology Hyderabad. He obtained his M.Tech (CSE) from MLR Institute of Technology & B.Tech (IT) from DRK College of Engineering and Technology,Hyderabad in the year 2014 & 2012 respectively. He had teaching experience of 8 years. His research interests include Cloud Computing, Python, Artificial Intelligence.

name: Mr.K Chandra Mouli
about: Mr. K Chandra Mouli is currently working as an Assistant professor in the Dept. of CSE at Gokaraju Rangaraju Institute of Engineering and Technology Hyderabad. He obtained his M.Tech (CSE) from Vaagdevi Institute of Technology and Science & B.Tech (IT) from KORM College of Engineering Kadapa in the year 2014 & 2011 respectively. He had teaching experience of 7 years. He had 13 publications in International Conferences and reputed Journals. His research interests include Cloud Computing, Machine Learning, Artificial Intelligence.

name: Ms.Ch.Sahiti
about: Ms. Ch.Sahithi, working as Assistant Professor in the Department of CSE from November,2022. My instructional approach may be compared as coaching. I attempt to ask the correct questions of my students instead of providing them with the answers, and with the aid of group projects and demonstrations, they ought to be able to do so. I believe that the younger generation lacks innovation and critical thinking. I work to support their development of these skills, which is why I favor coaching over lecturing. Simply put, I work to better equip my students for the difficulties they will encounter in the job market. Effective teaching and learning tactics are those that are founded on data, applied consistently, and result in long-lasting improvements in every student. My teaching approach is best characterized as participatory, encouraging, and open. Regardless of their level of confidence, I encourage all of my students to speak up in class, ask questions when they have them, and take an active part in all discussions. Coming to my teaching style I will use ppts or depends on student interest I can make the student easy to understand the subject in very easiest way. I can provide good material and files regarding subject. I am a Strong analytical, logical and statistical skill with ability to analyse the hidden patterns and trends in large data sets. Teacher play such an important part in shaping and guiding the students.
